summary: A group of men trap wild animals in Africa and sell them to zoos before the arrival of a female wildlife photographer threatens to change their ways.
cast: John Wayne|Hardy Krüger|Elsa Martinelli|Red Buttons|Gérard Blain|Bruce Cabot|Michèle Girardon|Valentin de Vargas|Eduard Franz|Queenie Leonard|Jon Chevron|Sam Harris|Cathy Lewis|Eric Rungren|Henry Scott|Emmett Smith|Jack Williams
title: ¡Hatari!
